archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Define Security Management policies & procedures to facilitate detection incidents
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Policy-based recognition of a possible incident. Within the Detection process the organization gains an awareness that Analysis has detected an anomaly â€“ relative to expected results -- and that a possible incident may be occurring or may have occurred.Â At this stage, automated policy-based remediation may still be possible â€“ i.e., without invoking Incident Management.
